Description of incident: Stater Brothers Markets in West Covina has sent out a notice to the public to help aprehend three suspects who placed a skimmer device on a pin pad in the deli department of the grocery chain located  at 375 North Azuza Avenue, West Covina California.They have also send the notification out for those who may have used their debit or credit card at the West Covina location from March 5, 2015 and March 29, 2015 to review their bank or credit card statements for any unauthorized activity. They are cautioning to change the pin if a debit card was utilized and contact the financial institutions that hold the card so new cards can be issued. For those with any information on the suspects, they are asking individuals to call 1-855-782-8377 between 8:99 a.m and 5:00 p.m Monday through Friday. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-55627
